The Heart Of The Resort
Indusrty
The resort hotel is a luxury facility that is intended primarily for vacationers and is
usually located near special attractions, such as beaches and seashores, scenic or historic areas, ski parks, or spas.

From thought-provoking content, to refreshing cocktails and whimsical stand up comedy sets, we have designed an inspiring program to celebrate the return
of Cannes Lions Festival of Creativity 2022.

Personified Advertising:
Engaging consumers in a cookieless world

When: Tuesday, June 21st (3pm-3:30pm)

Consumers have awakened to the value of their data and theneed to protect their privacy. Regulators’ righteous mission is accelerating, and the digital advertising ecosystem is undergoingits most significant transformation. The days of advertising relying on personal data are numbered.How do we provide a meaningful experience and leave a lasting impression on consumers, while future-proofing advertising?

Explore this year's Creative Themes
Hotel Indigo Bali Seminyak Beach is a stylish beachside hotel that is
close to local boutiques, international fashion houses, cafes,
galleries, restaurants, and hip bars. The hotel is also just steps from
the beautiful white sands of Mesari Beach. The Petitenget Temple is also
in the neighborhood and is the greatest landmark in the area.
This 5-star beach hotel offers free parking and free WiFi for all guests, a
full-service spa, and four outdoor pools.
